roleset.name: to look searchingly
roleset.note: PEER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'peer' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from peer.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with direction
example.text: [*] Open it and two soulful eyes on a boy 's brown face peer out from the page , pleadingly .
example.arg: two soulful eyes on a boy 's brown face

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: [*] Keep in mind that this is the same movie in which [a character]-1 is flattened [*-1] by a steamroller [*-1] only to pop right back up and peer in the window of a Boeing 747 -- from the outside -- as it takes off [*T*-2] .
example.arg: in the window of a Boeing 747
